name: The Gregory Ranch
description:
Welcome to THE GREGORY RANCH!!!

Merge Gregorys to obtain the supreme Gregory and reach enlightment!

IMPORTANT: Please play it on fullscreen. There is no save system yet, we're working on it right now ;)

Made for the Matchamaze Springjam by Sepi and Leo (Youtube, Spotify)

Other Gregory games:

Gregory's Epic Adventure

Moonlight Madness
